title: [WANTED] Video of Support and ADC triumphs
body:
Hey summoners!

I'm currently planning on working on a video which will represent the bond between Support and ADC's across league of legends.
I'm currently after footage of **ADC's** and **Supports** who are working well together.

I'll only be using _10 - 40 seconds_ of each clip, which I can edit myself.

If you'd like your video featured (_includes your IGN displayed in the video_), then simply upload what I'm requesting the youtube to paste the link in a reply below.

I've just scored permissions to use some great songs by various artists to use in the video.

Thanks!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
